articles.title: West Roxbury man killed in accident at Mass. millwork business
articles.description:
“He was a friend, a craftsman, and someone we were lucky to know,” Materia Millwork wrote in response to their employee’s death.

articles.title: ‘Disturbing trend’: Malden man, married to U.S. citizen, detained by ICE
articles.description:
The arrest is apparently part of "Operation Patriot 2.0" as ICE continues to target people "who are easy to pick up" as they go through the system, a lawyer said.
